learning_objective: Create programs that use variables to store and modify data.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is writing a program for a school project to translate a sentence from English to Spanish. Alex decides to start with the salutation 'Good Morning!'. Below is an attempt of Alex to draft the program.What is the output of this code?",
    "Answer1": "¡Buenas días!",
    "Answer2": "Good Morning!",
    "Answer3": "¡Buenas noches!",
    "Answer4": "No output",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Looking at line 3 in the code snippet, the variable 'salutation' initially stores the string 'Good Morning!'. After processing by the translateToSpanish() action on line 4, it's replaced by the Spanish equivalent '¡Buenas días!'. Thus the output of the program is '¡Buenas días!'.",
    "code_snippet": "text salutation = \"Good Morning!\"\naction translateToSpanish()\n    salutation = replace(salutation, \"Good Morning!\", \"¡Buenas días!\")\nend\n\ntranslateToSpanish()\noutput salutation"
}
